item.title: UK inflation live: Inflation rose to 3.4% in December
item.description: The UK's Consumer Price Index (CPI) measure of inflation rose by 3.4% in the 12 months to December, in part due to rising airfare and tobacco prices

item.title: Taxpayers urged to fight automated HMRC penalties as 20,000 win on appeal
item.description: HMRC loses more than 60% of cases when taxpayers appeal an automated penalty it has imposed, new figures show.
